thread.title: Services set for former Dallas ISD board President Hollis Brashear
thread.title_full: Services set for former Dallas ISD board President Hollis Brashear

author: Joe Simnacher
title: Services set for former Dallas ISD board President Hollis Brashear
text:
Services set for former Dallas ISD board President Hollis Brashear Filed under Obituaries at Get Daily Dallas News Headlines Sign Up Get Unlimited Digital Access Your first month is less than a dollar. $0.99 for first 4 weeks Subscribe Now 
A wake for former Dallas school board president Hollis Brashear will be from 6:30 to 8 p.m. Friday at Oak Cliff Bible Fellowship, 1808 W. Camp Wisdom Road in Dallas. Services will be at 11 a.m. Saturday at the church, where Brashear was an elder. 
A retired Army lieutenant colonel, Brashear will be buried at 1:30 p.m. Monday in Dallas-Fort Worth National Cemetery. 
Brashear, 81, died Sunday in his sleep at the rehabilitation center where he had been staying after a recent hospital stay. View Comments
